page.title: 15COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Communications to and from Port Talbot are very good.Most people living in the area have telephones and cars to communicate with.Running through Port Talbot is the M4 motorway and the main Swansea to London railway line connecting Port Talbot with major cities and towns in other parts of the country. Port Talbot's bus service is also quite good.There are many Post Offices giving people many different ways of communicating. Port Talbot also has a deep water harbour but is only used for the steelworks and not for public use.
